cultivationcraft.gui.generic.reinforce.d: Reinforce this body part to be stronger without making any significant change to its structure
cultivationcraft.gui.bodypart.skin.rubbe: Forge your skin into a rubber-like consistency, making it stretchy, bouncy and providing an extremely high resistance to lightning
cultivationcraft.gui.bodypart.back.wings: Grow wings to carry you through the sky
cultivationcraft.gui.headpart.jaw.descri: Unhinge your jaw to allow your mouth to open much wider than usually possible
cultivationcraft.gui.headpart.eye.qisigh: Forge your eyes to be able to see large concentrations of Qi
cultivationcraft.gui.headpart.mouth.flat: Grow larger, flat teeth, allowing you to chew up and swallow almost any substance
cultivationcraft.gui.headpart.mouth.shar: Grow larger, sharper teeth, providing you with a highly damaging bite attack
cultivationcraft.gui.armpart.glide.descr: Grow a thin membrane connecting your arms to your body, providing you with the ability to glide through the air that cannot be disabled
cultivationcraft.gui.legpart.reversejoin: Reverse the joints in your knees allowing you to jump significantly higher
cultivationcraft.technique.meditate.desc: Activate to meditate, absorbing the Qi around you to enhance your cultivation
cultivationcraft.technique.divinesense.d: Toggle on to sense the Qi around you, allowing you to "see" large concentrations of Qi
cultivationcraft.technique.icewalk.descr: Toggle on to freeze whatever is below your feet as you move, including air!
cultivationcraft.technique.leap.descript: Activate to quickly leap forward a great distance
cultivationcraft.technique.bite.descript: Toggle on to replace your attack with a bite attack when selected
cultivationcraft.technique.roll.descript:
Toggle on to roll around instead of walking.
§cWARNING: §cDOING §cTHIS §cIN §cFIRST §cPERSON §cIS §cNOT §cADVISED
cultivationcraft.technique.float.descrip: Toggle on to replace your jump with the ability to blow yourself up into a balloon and slowly float upwards
cultivationcraft.technique.spread.descri: Toggle on to spread your wings. Hold jump whilst in the air to raise your wings and release jump to flap them downwards, raising your higher into the air
cultivationcraft.technique.bounce.descri: Toggle on to curl yourself into a ball when in the air, increasing the amount you bounce when you land
